snippet: Holland Cotter grew up surrounded by books and regularly spent days wandering in the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston.
abstract: Holland Cotter Critic's Notebook shares the origins of his passion for poetry and art, having grown up surrounded by books and regularly wandering in Museum of Fine Arts, Boston; sees poetry as tangible, almost-physical objects that can be held and touched much like art, making connection between page and canvas a natural progression.
lead_paragraph: Holland Cotter grew up surrounded by books and regularly spent days wandering in the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston.

headline.seo: An Art Critic Is First Inspired by Words
headline.main: Finding Poetry on the Page and, Later, on the Canvas
headline.print_headline: Finding Poetry on the Page and, Later, on the Canvas
